GSD.description:
xen/netfront: harden netfront against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.296 by commit 81900aa7d7a130dec4c55b68875e30fb8c9effec. For more details please see the references link.
